backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with user profiles, trades, mistakes, subscriptions, and helpers for access control and subscription status.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module exposing a no‑op run function.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and dark mode theme tokens using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint mounting the React app with favicon and title metadata.
frontend/public/domain-slug.txt: Defines the deployment domain slug for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, entitlement-based tab visibility, error states, and initial profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Empty placeholder file for admin access dialog component.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDisco: Admin dialog for listing, creating, editing, and deleting discount objects with timestamp handling and form state.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Main admin dashboard that loads all user data, filters users by ID, and opens dialogs for user details, payment methods, and discounts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPayme: Dialog for viewing, creating, editing, and deleting payment methods with form handling and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserD: Dialog displaying user profile, trades, mistakes, and subscription info with actions to activate, cancel, or remove a user.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity authentication with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/journal/EditTrad: Dialog for editing or deleting a trade entry with form fields mapped to trade properties and update/delete mutations.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalA: Header component showing analytics stats such as total trades, accuracy, and P/L with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/journal/ProfitCa: Renders a monthly calendar showing aggregated daily net P/L and trade counts, allowing month navigation and date selection.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeEnt: Provides a form to create new trade entries, handling date, session, pair, risk values, and submission state.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeLis: Displays a table of recorded trades with formatted data, P/L calculation, and optional editing actions.
frontend/src/components/mistakes/EditMis: Modal dialog for editing or deleting a mistake entry with form validation and confirmation handling.
frontend/src/components/mistakes/Mistake: Form for logging a new trading mistake including date, category, and description, with submission handling.
Lists logged mistakes with category, date, description, AI suggestion, and supports editing via a dialog.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: A dialog component that collects full name and username to create a user profile and start a free trial.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Pa: Displays payment details for a selected plan with QR code instructions and support contact info.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Su: Manages subscription state, displays available plans, handles plan selection, and routes to payment view.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithStatus.ts: Enhanced actor initialization hook providing connection status, retries, and access control setup handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useEntitlement.ts: Derives feature access and plan status based on the caller's subscription or trial state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login handling, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, trades, mistakes, subscriptions, and admin checks, wrapping backend actor calls with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for theming, applying global styles and typography.
frontend/src/lib/backendConnectionErrors: Classifies backend connection errors into user-friendly categories, detecting stopped canisters, timeouts, and initialization issues.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports constants for the app's name, tagline, and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/domainSlug.ts: Validates and generates sanitized domain slugs and exports the app’s predefined slug.
frontend/src/lib/pipValues.ts: Stores pip values for common forex pairs and exposes a helper to retrieve pip values or null for unsupported pairs.
frontend/src/lib/riskCalculator.ts: Calculates pip values and trade lot sizes with validation for risk, stop loss, and pip value inputs.
frontend/src/lib/trades.ts: Provides helpers to compute trade P/L and format currency and signed P/L amounts.
frontend/src/lib/tradingPairs.ts: Defines selectable trading pair options for forms and calculators, including major pairs and custom options.
frontend/src/lib/userId.ts: Formats and parses sequential user IDs into readable strings and back.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/tabs/JournalTab.tsx: Displays trades, analytics, and a calendar view, allowing trade entry and date-based filtering.
frontend/src/tabs/MistakesTab.tsx: Shows AI‑assisted mistake logging with a form and list of recorded mistakes.
frontend/src/tabs/ProfileTab.tsx: Manages user profile viewing/editing, admin access, and subscription management with conditional rendering.
frontend/src/tabs/RiskCalculatorTab.tsx: React component providing a risk management calculator that computes lot size based on account type, account size, risk mode, stop-loss pips, and trading pair pip values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, writing, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON document describing current project state, admin-panel requirements, existing features, and pending feature requests tied to admin access and authorization.
